data.title: Juan E. - New York, NY, USA
data.meta_description:
I am Juan L. Espinal, a video editor, producer, and director with over four years of experience.  
I’ve worked in the film industry in a variety of projects, from commercial and branded videos to fictional and documentary pieces. Producing digital content that is native to specific social platforms implementing the best practices in digital editing, shooting and directing. My great attention to details along with my knowledge of motion graphics, storytelling, and
excellent editing skills will make me an asset to your next project.
data.text:
About

I am Juan L. Espinal, a video editor, producer, and director with over four years of experience. I’ve worked in the film industry in a variety of projects, from commercial and branded videos to fictional and documentary pieces. Producing digital content that is native to specific social platforms implementing the best practices in digital editing, shooting and directing. My great attention to details along with my knowledge of motion graphics, storytelling, and excellent editing skills will make me an asset to your next project.
